## 1. The Change
**Proposed Text:**
> (Write the new axiom text or the modification here)

## 2. Rationale (The "Why")
**Tacit Knowledge:**
-   [ ] Why is this needed?
-   [ ] What risk does this mitigate?
-   [ ] Why is this not covered by existing axioms?

## 3. Test Cases (The Proof)
**PASS Example:**
-   (Describe a concrete scenario that adheres to this rule)

**FAIL Example:**
-   (Describe a concrete scenario that violates this rule)

## 4. Impact Analysis
-   [ ] Will this break existing projects?
-   [ ] Does this apply to non-software projects?
